name: mm-action
description: A fully-styled inline text link with optional icon.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Used for defining a hypertext source link, just like an <a> element.

attributes.name: underline
attributes.description: Instructs the component to underline the link text.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Used to specifies where to display the linked resource, just like an <a> element.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Sets the visual and interaction state to be disabled.
